Visibility¶

The visibility module is intended to provide a simple API for visibility-related features.

SASS¶

@mixin visible($mode)

Sets the visibility of the current element. Old mixin visibility is available as alias for legacy support.

$mode

The possible modes are:

hide

Excluded from the rendering tree, display:none;

invisible

Invisible, but still uses the space, visibility:hidden;

show

Show as (inline) element, display:initial;

showblock

Show as block element, display:block;

hidecontent

Hide (inline) content. May be used to replace text with images. Use with buttons, as seen in the demo.

visuallyhidden

Hide element visually, but show them for screen readers.
